description: antsApplyTransformsToPoints, applied to an input image, transforms it according to a reference image and a transform (or a set of transforms). It reads in a CSV file with the first D columns defining the spatial location where the spatial location is defined in physical coordinates. The CSV file should have a header row.

dimensionality.title: Dimensionality
dimensionality.description: This option forces the points to be treated as a specified-dimensionality.

input.title: Input
input.description: Input CSV file with columns including x,y,z,t headers that define the points in physical space, or a 2D .mha binary image file.

output.title: Output
output.description: Output the warped points to a CSV file.

transform.title: Transform
transform.description: Transform file(s) to apply to the input points. Uses an inverse transform if specified as [transformFileName,1].
